glsa.title: ClamAV: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ClamAV, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: Clam AntiVirus (ClamAV) is an anti-virus toolkit for UNIX, designed especially for e-mail scanning on mail gateways.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ClamAV. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted file, leading to arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ClamAV users should upgrade to the latest version:
